description.narrative: The Secondary Towns Urban Development Project will improve water supply in three secondary towns of Samdrup Jongkhar, Sarpang, and Trashigang; improve sewerage in Samdrup Jongkhar; and develop drainage and road infrastructure in Sarpang's new satellite town. The project will support the strengthening of institutional capacity for the management and operation and maintenance (O&M) of municipal infrastructure assets and develop water tariff guidelines.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President

Samdrup Jongkhar, Sarpang, and Trashigang:
Staged water tariff framework developed (2017 baseline: n.a.)
